alert.note: Alert for Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 01 at 2:36PM EDT until April 03 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by runoff from excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Heidelberg. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of around 18.9 feet on Sunday morning, and then begin to recede. - Action stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued 1130 PM this evening.
